readingMnemonic: You’re unable to stop the guard from <kanji>undress</kanji>ing and making his <kanji>escape</kanji>, so you decide to start throwing some <reading>darts</reading> (だつ) at him. Perhaps that’ll make him stop.
meaningMnemonic: The light of the <radical>moon</radical> is shining on a <radical>guard</radical> who’s been on duty all night. In fact, the moon light is making him so warm, he’s trying to <kanji>undress</kanji> and <kanji>escape</kanji>! Somebody stop him!
